title: Interpreters in education
brief_description: Provides an introduction for teachers to the work of interpreters in education. Stela Leonidas, a Greek interpreter, and Osman Ayyuce, a Turkish interpreter, take part in two parent/teacher interviews to show the work of interpreters in education.
